sources.title: The Home Front (1943)
sources.description: An American 1943 instruction film, designed to inform service personnel and improve troop morale. Private Snafu imagines the good times his family is having back home while he’s freezing in the barracks. Technical Fairy First Class shows how his family is helping with the war effort, even the cat and the horse, named in reference to The Lone Ranger. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/the-home-front-1943/

metadata.Plot: A homesick Pvt. Snafu learns that his family are almost as commited to the war efforts as himself.
